items.sentence: After hearing the sad news, Tom broke down in tears.
The most common first name in the world is Mohammed.
I think Tom must be much older than you think he is.
I'm sorry for the pain I caused you and your family.
I'm hanging a picture of my grandmother on the wall.
You're not supposed to go hunting without a license.
I'm going to chock the wheels so the car won't move.
Tom couldn't believe that that was really happening.
My car was stolen. It's no longer where I parked it.
The room was pitch black, so I couldn't see a thing.
